C

Conversion - Class in Unnamed Package
This class converts Philippine pesos to USD and viceversa
Conversion() - Constructor for class Conversion
 

D

displayConversion(int) - Static method in class Conversion
This method takes option previously selected by the user, then gets a currency value (either in Pesos or USD) and calls the appropriate method to make the conversion
dollarToPeso(double) - Static method in class Conversion
This method takes a value in USD and returns its equivalent in Philippine pesos

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class Conversion
Starting point of the program

P

pesoToDollar(double) - Static method in class Conversion
This method takes a value in Philippine pesos and returns its equivalent in USD

R

returnToMainMenuOrExit() - Static method in class Conversion
This method shows after a conversion has executed.

S

showMenu() - Static method in class Conversion
This method displays a menu of options to the user, gets an input and returns it to the main method so that it can be further processed
